last_episode_to_air.name: Happy Ann-RV-sary
last_episode_to_air.overview: Adam tries to give Andi the perfect 20th wedding anniversary gift by recreating their honeymoon. Series finale.

name: Man with a Plan
overview: A dad finds out that parenting is harder than he thought after his wife goes back to work and he's left at home to take care of the kids.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: An old-school father encounters the modern challenges of parenting three school-aged children, marriage and running a general contracting business with his brother after his supportive wife returns to work. He also has to deal with his overbearing parents. The series is set in suburban Pittsburgh.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: In the series premiere, Adam, a contractor starts spending more time with his three kids when his wife, Andi, goes back to work and discovers the truth all parents realize; their little angels are maniacs.

episodes.name: Two Tickets to Paradise
episodes.overview: When Adamâ€™s client offers him two highly coveted tickets to a Pittsburgh Steelers game, he is stuck between choosing to take his wife, Andi, or his brother, Don.

episodes.name: The Puppet Theater
episodes.overview: When Adam gets fed up with endless demands from his daughter's kindergarten teacher, Mrs. Rodriguez, he makes a hasty decision that lands him in hot water with his wife Andi.

episodes.name: Un-Dressed
episodes.overview: When Don encourages Adam to clean out his cluttered garage and turn it into a man cave, Adam panics when he thinks he donated one of Andi's treasured keepsakes.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Andi has a hard time not taking over when Adam tackles organizing the school's big Thanksgiving feast with Don and Lowell.

episodes.name: The Holey War
episodes.overview: Adam and Andi team up to find out who put a hole in the wall.

episodes.name: Winter Has Come
episodes.overview: When a blizzard prevents the Burns family from visiting the grandparents' house for Christmas, Adam and Andi scramble to avoid an epic holiday disaster.

episodes.name: Adam Steps Up
episodes.overview: Adam tries to keep cool when his oldest daughter goes through a momentous occasion, while Andi gets stuck in traffic taking Emme and Teddy to the zoo.

episodes.name: What About Bob?
episodes.overview: Adam tries to pretend he's not jealous when he discovers Andi has a close friend at work.

episodes.name: A Dinner Gone Wrong
episodes.overview: When Andi and Marcy realize they were rivals in high school, Adam and Don are dragged into the feud and forced to take sides.

episodes.name: The Talk
episodes.overview: When Adam and Andi have the dreaded 'talk' with Teddy and Kate, their awkward approach makes the kids horribly uncomfortable.

episodes.name: The Three Amigos
episodes.overview: When Andi forces Adam to hang out with Lowell, Don feels left out and Andi has to make peace between them. Also, Mrs. Rodriguez reveals to Andi that she had a sexy dream about Adam.

episodes.name: Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: Adam forgets to find a babysitter while planning a romantic Valentine's Day with Andi, as a result, both of them try to survive the stress of leaving Kate in charge at home for the first time. Also, Don forgets to make romantic plans for Marcy and tries to steal Adam's.

episodes.name: Kate's First Date
episodes.overview: Adam can't stop being overprotective when Kate is asked out on her first date; Lowell helps Don buy an anniversary gift for Marcy.

episodes.name: Assisted Living
episodes.overview: Adam's parents make an unannounced visit and reveal surprising plans for their future living arrangements.

episodes.name: The A Team
episodes.overview: Adam and Andi are shocked when they finally meet Lowell's wife, Jen.

episodes.name: Doctor No
episodes.overview: When Adam convinces his stubborn father to finally go to the doctor, he learns a few things his dad didn't want him to know.

episodes.name: The Blame Game
episodes.overview: Adam and Don discover a sneaky way of getting out of trouble with their wives.

episodes.name: Spring Fling
episodes.overview: When a client doesn't want Don to attend a big meeting, Adam goes to great lengths to protect his brother's feelings. Also, Andi kisses up to Mrs. Rodriguez to ensure that Emme gets in the class of the good first grade teacher.

episodes.name: Dirty Money
episodes.overview: When Adam and Andi borrow money from Joe to help with a cash flow problem, they soon regret it.

episodes.name: Operation False Freedom
episodes.overview: When Adam and Andi discover Kate is lying to them about her whereabouts, they hatch a plan to catch her.

episodes.name: Buzzer Beater
episodes.overview: Adam and Andi toy with the idea of having another baby when Don and Marcy's newborn grandson comes for a visit.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: An old-school father encounters the modern challenges of parenting three school-aged children, marriage and running a general contracting business with his brother after his supportive wife returns to work. He also has to deal with his overbearing parents. The series is set in suburban Pittsburgh.

episodes.name: The Silver Fox
episodes.overview: Andi hires a pretty, young babysitter, Sophia; Andi gets jealous when her daughter goes to Sophia for advice instead of her; Sophia tells Adam she is attracted to him.

episodes.name: Andi's Boyfriend
episodes.overview: When Adam discovers that the pastor he hired for their wedding was a phony and he and Andi aren't really married, he scrambles to find a way to fix it before she finds out.

episodes.name: The Parents Strike Back
episodes.overview: When the kids won't do their chores, Adam and Andi decide to go on strike too.

episodes.name: Into The Weeds
episodes.overview: When Adam thinks Kate's boyfriend, Tyler, is a pothead, he decides to confront Tyler but doesn't get the support he expects from Andi. As a result, he turns to his dad who was very opposed to weed when raising Adam for some advice, only to find out that his views on the matter have become more liberal.

episodes.name: Battle of the Sexists
episodes.overview: When Adam needs to hire a new project manager, Andi accuses him of unconscious bias after he only interviews men for the job. Also, Andi helps Kate fight for a spot on the boys' soccer team at school.

episodes.name: Adam Gets Neighborly
episodes.overview: Adam and Andi try to get back in their neighbors' good graces after no one shows up to their potluck.

episodes.name: We Can Be Heroes
episodes.overview: When Adam and Andi are caught off guard by unexpected expenses, they each decide to give up a luxury to pay them off.

episodes.name: Lice, Lice Baby
episodes.overview: Adam is forced to bring the kids along to work while he has an important work meeting planned with his boss. It is not until later he discovers that the kids have lice which causes a series of other issues. Meanwhile Andi is upset at the idea that she's a bad mother since she is the only one that doesn't get lice.

episodes.name: The Gunfight
episodes.overview: When Adam notices his dad's increasingly forgetful behavior, he struggles with how to approach him to discuss it.

episodes.name: Adam's Turtle-y Awesome Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: When Adam and Andi agree on a present-free Valentine's Day, Adam gives Andi's gift to his mother. Unfortunately this causes a slew of problems for everyone.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner
episodes.overview: When Andi gets Bev a spot volunteering at the hospital, Joe becomes bored and starts spending too much time with Adam.

episodes.name: Everybody's a Winner
episodes.overview: When Andi and Adam disagree about Kate attending a dance with an older boy, Adam tries to outsmart Andi to win the argument.

episodes.name: The Party Planner
episodes.overview: Adam attempts to organize a birthday dinner for Andi and he discovers that managing guests isn't easy.

episodes.name: March Madness
episodes.overview: Adam and Andi lose footage of an intimate moment they accidentally recorded. They must track it down before anyone can see it.

episodes.name: Out With the In-Laws
episodes.overview: When Andi's parents decide to visit them for Easter, Adam and Andi have to keep the peace between both sets of parents.

episodes.name: April Fools
episodes.overview: When Adam insists that pranks are harmless fun, Andi creates an elaborate hoax to teach him a lesson.

episodes.name: King for a Day
episodes.overview: Adam is determined to figure out what Andi's hiding when he discovers she's been keeping secrets from him for his own good.

episodes.name: The Burns System
episodes.overview: Adam is thrilled and honored to help Joe buy a new car but is caught off guard when Joe suddenly becomes irritable and the negotiations go off track. Also, Andi discovers Emme has been hiding a pet snake and has to figure out a way to get rid of it.

episodes.name: We Hate Money
episodes.overview: When Adam and Don realize they need to bring in more business, they film a commercial advertising their company. Also, Andi works up the courage to ask her boss, Bob, for a raise.

episodes.name: We Got a Girl
episodes.overview: Adam and Andi set up Adam's boss on a date to boost her spirits in the hope that she'll then be in the mood to have Adam resume work on the mini-mall.

episodes.name: Family Business
episodes.overview: After struggling to find work, Andi proposes an idea for her and Adam to go into business together; Adam tackles a challenging renovation of Joe and Bevâ€™s kitchen.

episodes.name: Wife-Proof
episodes.overview: Adam attempts to make the office feel more inviting since Andi will be joining him at work every day. Also, Lowell has been hiding a life-changing secret.

episodes.name: Yeah, Maybe
episodes.overview: When Adam and Andi have a disagreement at the office, they must find a way to solve it so it doesn't become a problem at home. Also, the kids try to extend Lowell's stay at their house after realizing he's an amazing cook.

episodes.name: Put Him on the Ground
episodes.overview: When Adam sees a kid push Emme, he convinces Teddy to dish out some old-school justice to defend his younger sister, to Andi's dismay. Also, Adam and Don persuade Joe to hire a nurse to help out after his upcoming knee surgery.

episodes.name: Adam's Wall Hole Bowl
episodes.overview: Adam and the guys visit Lowell at his new bachelor pad and start using it as a hangout to get away from their home lives for a bit. Also, Andi keeps pushing Adam to finally give her her own desk at the office.

episodes.name: The New Old School
episodes.overview: When Adam catches Kate sneaking back into the house at night, he is determined to fix the behavior with old-school parenting tactics. Also, Andi is dismayed when she can't find many baby pictures of Emme.

episodes.name: Semi-Indecent Proposal
episodes.overview: Adam and Andi go to great lengths to secure a loan to fix an unexpected issue on their flip house. Also, Joe is enjoying hanging out with his nurse, Funchy, and wants to find a way to get him to stay with him longer than planned.

episodes.name: Hotel Hanky Panky
episodes.overview: Adam and Andi are eager to book a night away in a hotel after Teddy keeps sleeping in their bed. Also, Kate is allowed to stay home alone but doesn't follow Adam and Andi's strict rules.

episodes.name: Adam's Ribs
episodes.overview: Adam offers to eat a vegan diet with Kate in an effort to bond with her, but his love of meat proves a hard habit to break.

episodes.name: Adam Acts His Age
episodes.overview: After Adam throws out his back on his 50th birthday, he is still determined to take a dirt bike excursion and check it off his bucket list. Also, Don and Adam give out bonuses at work and everyone tries to figure out how to spend them.

episodes.name: We Don't Need Another Hero
episodes.overview: Adam gets jealous when Teddy names Andi as his hero for a school essay.

episodes.name: Cabin Fever
episodes.overview: When Adam accidentally invites Andi on the annual guys' trip, he tries to un-invite her, which only makes matters worse.

episodes.name: Clean Country Living
episodes.overview: Adam recruits Marcy to put Andi's snooty sister, Kelly, in her place when she comes for a visit.

episodes.name: The Intervention(s)
episodes.overview: Adam and Andi stage an intervention with Lowell after they see how his new relationship with Andi's sister, Kelly, is changing him.

episodes.name: The V-Word
episodes.overview: When Andi's doctor advises her to stop taking birth control pills, Adam and Andi disagree on an alternate option.

episodes.name: Adam's Big Little Lie
episodes.overview: Adam promises not to lie to Andi again but finds himself in a tough spot when he has to cover for Joe.

episodes.name: The Ex Files
episodes.overview: Adam and Don become super protective of Lowell when they think he might get back together with his cheating ex-wife. Also, Joe experiences an unexpected side effect from his new pacemaker that Bev is less than thrilled with.

episodes.name: Going All the Way
episodes.overview: Adam and Andi offer Teddy dating advice but wind up making things super awkward for him instead.

episodes.name: Winner Winner Chicken Salad
episodes.overview: Adam encourages Don to give himself food poisoning to get out of babysitting his destructive grandson. Also, Adam and Andi argue over who has to take Kate and her teenage friends dress shopping.

episodes.name: Couples Therapy
episodes.overview: When Adam buys a boat without asking Andi, they wind up in couple's therapy to settle the disagreement.

episodes.name: Dude, Where's My Boat?
episodes.overview: Adam discovers someone is sneaking his boat out at night, and he assumes the culprits are Don and Joe. Also, after Andi makes Kate get a job at the mall, Kate decides she no longer wants to go to college.

episodes.name: Adam's Not Sorry
episodes.overview: When Adam and Don disagree about a new house to flip for their construction business, their bickering reveals bigger issues in their relationship.

episodes.name: Stuck in the Middle with You
episodes.overview: Adam's mother-in-law, Alice, makes an unexpected visit and reveals some shocking news.

episodes.name: Full Metal Teddy
episodes.overview: When Adam and Andi resort to their usual punishment in response to Teddyâ€™s bad grades, his unexpected reaction catches them off guard.

episodes.name: Adam and Andi See Other People
episodes.overview: Adam and Andi attempt to spice up their social life by making new friends.

episodes.name: Driving Miss Katie
episodes.overview: Adam has trouble helping Katie prepare for her driving test. Also, Don turns to Lowell for help romancing Marcy.

episodes.name: Happy Ann-RV-sary
episodes.overview: Adam tries to give Andi the perfect 20th wedding anniversary gift by recreating their honeymoon. Series finale.
